# Tools for visualising amplicon data

ampvis2 is an R-package to visualise amplicon data. more more more

## Installing ampvis2
First, install [R](https://mirrors.dotsrc.org/cran/) (and for Windows also [RTools](https://mirrors.dotsrc.org/cran/bin/windows/Rtools/)) and [RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download). Then open RStudio as administrator (!) and run the 2 commands below to install ampvis2 from the console. If you get asked to update old packages, just hit a, and should you get an error about a missing package, just use `install.packages("packagename")` to install it. If that doesn't work, try with `biocLite("packagename")` instead.
```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, eval=FALSE}
source("http://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
biocLite("kasperskytte/ampvis2")
```

## Shiny ampvis
An interactive Shiny app with some of the basic functionality of ampvis2 can be found at [https://kasperskytte.shinyapps.io/shinyampvis](https://kasperskytte.shinyapps.io/shinyampvis)
